banners.title: Welcome!
banners.body: Hey - welcome to my blog! I hope you'll learn some awesome new things here :) Learn More

banners.title: Coming Soon - Ricochet Riddles
banners.body: Ricochet Riddles is coming soon on my itch.io! Place bricks and other objects onto the grid and let the ball bounce to the goal in the quickest time! Preview coming soon...
